dcterms:description: The dataset comes with detailed HD maps in the vectorized format, covering two urban areas in Pittsburgh and Miami. It consists of over 200k five-second-long training scenarios labeled at 10Hz, and the task is predicting the motion of one specially marked object, called the agent, over the last 3 seconds of the scenario, given its motion and environment in the first 2 seconds.
dcterms:title: Argoverse Motion Forecasting dataset
